variables.label: Vikunja Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/vikunja/vikunja/tags

instructions.start: Deploying Vikunja to-do list and task management.
instructions.end: Vikunja has been deployed! Visit http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain to create your account and start managing tasks.

description: To-do list and task management. Open-source project management with lists, Gantt charts, and Kanban boards.
